HERO_SUBTITLE: Using Blockchain technology to enable a secure connection within patients, clinics, schools and airlines.
FEATURES_CARD_1_SUBTITLE: Data authentication with strong encryption, global standard servers and the security of Blockchain technology. 100% in accordance with LGPDP.
FEATURES_CARD_2_SUBTITLE: Your clinic's logo always at the patient's hand on the digital vaccination card
FEATURES_CARD_3_SUBTITLE: Immunie provides full traceability of vaccine application by individual serial number.
FEATURES_CARD_4_SUBTITLE: Improve your recurring visits with automatic reminders when new vaccines are about to get due.
FEATURES_TITLE: Be ready for the next demands.
FEATURES_SUBTITLE: Safe and digital control of immunisation will have a new role in the post-Covid-19 world.
FEATURES_PROPERTIES_1: Connect with passenger transportation companies and major sport events managers
FEATURES_PROPERTIES_3: Automatic return reminders for new vaccines via email and PUSH
ABOUT_TITLE: Simple, fast and clear data input.
ABOUT_SUBTITLE: The healthcare professional needs to insert the vaccine and lot number once, and Immunie automatically fills the timestamp of the transaction, the clinic and professionalÂ´s details in milliseconds. Once confirmed, this single entry will be recorded at the clinic's log and available for the patient at its digital vaccination card.
ABOUT_REVIEW_CARD_TITLE: Immunie has reduced the workload at our clinic and eliminated the need for after consultation support at the reception desk.
NETWORK_TITLE: Schools, Airline Carriers and Sport Venues.
NETWORK_SUBTITLE: Be part of a network that connects data generated by your clinic to your patients, schools, airlines or major sporting events managers.
NETWORK_PROPERTIES_2: Integration of different Applications via API
NETWORK_PROPERTIES_4: Issuance of eICV vaccination certificate following the WHO templates
HOW_IT_WORKS_ITEM_1_SUBTITLE: Our compliance will check licenses and permits of your healthcare business. Once submitted, it normally takes less than 24 hours to have it done.
HOW_IT_WORKS_ITEM_2_SUBTITLE: Training can be done in person or via video. The session lasts about 1 hour and after that, you can count on our support team.
HOW_IT_WORKS_ITEM_3_SUBTITLE: Good to go! Now your clinic is digitally integrated and connected to your patients and other sources of customer origination.
PRIVACY_SUBTITLE: Immunie was built according to the highest global privacy standards, being 100% in accordance with the Data Privacy Act in UK, European GDPR and CDPA California.
SUPPORT_GRID_1_SUBTITLE: Please take a look at if our FAQ section can help you.
SUPPORT_GRID_2_SUBTITLE: Looking for a customized solution? We are ready to build a solution that fits your needs.
STORY_GRID_1_SUBTITLE: We are a start up selected for the London Business School incubator, edition 2020-2021. Our company was created with the mission of saving lives by helping people, health professionals and public health managers to use technology to better control serious diseases that can be prevented by vaccines.
STORY_GRID_2_SUBTITLE: With your data up to date, reminders and alerts on your smartphone and an always-updated calendar, you know what to do in order to stay protected, to be Immunie;)
REVIEWS_TITLE: We work with the best technology and the best service providers in the global market
